MAIN_MESSAGE: We apologise that today's pre arranged work affecting your property in the CH8 postcode area of Holywell is still ongoing. This is due to difficulties on site and we now expect power to be back on by 7PM.  We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:28PM on 28th April 2021
